content.description:
Pliny and His Villa

Reliqua pars lateris huius servorum libertorumque 
usibus detinetur, quamquam multa cubicula tam mundamundus, -a, -um, adj.: elegant 
ut accipere hospites possint. Ex alio latere cubiculum est
politissimumpolitus, -a, -um, adj.: decorated; deinde alium cubiculum magnum vel cenatiocenatio, -onis, f.: dining room.
content.question: In providing services to his client freedmen (libertorum, line 1), a patron could expect which of the following in return?

choices.label: Their participation in his public entourage
A willingness to defend him in court

content.answer: Their participation in his public entourage
